nodes.text: RS-D04 Assault Droid was a model of humanoid-shaped battle droid used by the Galactic Republic during the war against Zakuul. Many droids of this model were used by the Rike's Raiders unit led by Republic General Amos Rike during the Assault on Denova in 3630 BBY.
RS-D04 Assault Droids appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during the "Trench Runner" Uprising.
